attributes.action: ease traffic congestion by limiting HGVs and coaches overtaking on motorways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to ease congestion on motorways introduce a law whereby it is an offence for an HGV or coach to overtake unless the vehicle in front is travelling at least 10 mph slower than the speed at which the HGV/coach  can overtake. This should be in force from 6.00am - 8.00pm during the week and all Saturdays, Sundays and Bank Holidays.
